Text: Thank you!  Do you have number 7 as well?

What can we do to see episode 7???
is there going to be a WEBRIP or soething?

According to http://www.sho.com/sho/oliver-stones-untold-history-of-the-united-states/season/1/episode/7#/index , any Showtime subscriber with either "On Demand" or "Showtime Anytime" service -- and the ability to capture from the service -- has until 05-Feb-2013 to get episode 7.
